name: David Sigmund
text: Great tasting pizza but terrible customer service. Staff needs some "people skills" training and also "how to properly answer the phone in a courteous manner." Zpizza, you can do better. We love your pizza, but come on.

name: Taylor Wyche
text: Loved it! Great food and great, friendly service!

name: Tim Elliott
text: Apparently tomato sauce is an option on the pizza here, our vegi pie had none.  Silly me for not asking.  And cooking the crust must be an option too, ours was not cooked in the middle, very soggy.  Maybe I expect too much.

name: Sara Schmalz
text: Really great pizza, similar to CPK but a little cheaper. Definitely recommend!! We will be eating here again.

name: steven gleason
text: The only reason I give this place 4 stars / it really should be 5 stars for their food quality/, it is because the owner really should do something about interior, ambiance. It is very unassuming place, and always kind of dark inside. …More

name: Cameron Figgins
text: I called the local store to deliver and they didn't have a delivery guy available I was told to call the 7th Street store when I did I got ran around even though I told him I was successful guy that was willing to tip and take care of them …More

name: Gary Thompson
text: Had a great pear and gorgonzola salad and an even better Moroccan pizza! We were just in town for the night but made an excellent choice in eateries!!

name: David Alpern
text: The best pizza in the local area. Z Pizza is a chain specializing in upscale pizza, with various sophisticated toppings and a variety of bread options, including wheat crust.

name: Doug Kiel
text: On Jan 22nd I ordered a pizza to pick up.  Told me it would be 30 mins.  I came in on time and they hadnt even started the order yet.  Left and came back 30 mins later AND they still hadnt started it.  I could understand if they were busy …More

name: Georgie Hood
text: Pizaa is great! Stopped in for 2 slices (nice and wam) with a drink...pepperoni and sausage is my favorite. They have some interesting options on the menu (thai pizza) I look forward to trying. Much better than pizza hut or dominos...tastes fresh and full of quality.

name: Rodney S
text: Look out, Pizza Hut & Papa John's!  zpizza offers more upscale pizza pies w/o being expensive.  Many options available to customize your pizza just the way you want it, including gluten-free. …More

name: Adam Field
text: Kind of expensive, but if you want really tasty california-style pizza, this is the place to go. I would understand people complaining about the price of a pizza here, but I do -not- understand anyone complaining about the quality.

name: Omar Perez
text: Don’t order delivery from here they will call you at the time you should be getting your food delivered and lie to you about why they cannot deliver to you.

name: Matthew Kerley-Otten
text: Its OK I guess, below average food.
